definition: a saw/to cut with a saw
gold/chemical element Au/generic term for lustrous and ductile metals/money/golden/highly respected/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]
(archaic) sentence-final particle expressing a doubting attitude
to reside/to be (in a certain position)/to store up/to be at a standstill/residence/house/restaurant/classifier for bedrooms
a two-man saw/fig. to-and-fro between two sides
knife, saw, ax and hatchet (idiom); facing torture and execution
knife, saw and cauldron/ancient instruments of torture/fig. torture
serratus anterior muscle (upper sides of the chest)

sentences.english: In the Asian version of this execution, the victim would stand upright and the sawing would begin at the top of the head.
sentences.chinese: 在亞洲版的鋸刑中，犯人是站直的，行刑從頭部開始。

sentences.english: He was sawing all day and finally sawed the tree down.
sentences.chinese: 他鋸了一整天，最終把樹鋸倒了。

sentences.english: He was sawing all day and finally sawed the tree down.
sentences.chinese: 他鋸了一整天，最終把樹鋸倒了。

sentences.english: A sculpin is not so smooth as a trout.
After they cut through more layers of steel, a hidden trap finally appeared.
sentences.chinese: 又鋸掉了幾層鋼板之後，一個暗藏的玄機終於顯露。

sentences.english: “If you have to cut off my legs, I want to die, ” he said.
sentences.chinese: “如果一定要鋸掉我的腿，我寧願去死，”他說。

sentences.english: What's changed me about them is another bow build I saw.
sentences.chinese: 改變什麼我關於他們是另一弓修造我鋸。

sentences.english: Grinding at your head with my bone saw breaking zygoma.
sentences.chinese: 你的頭磨我的骨鋸打破顴骨。

sentences.english: This Rotary Saw comes with a circle-cutting template for extreme accuracy.
sentences.chinese: 這種旋轉鋸帶有一個極端的精度圓切割模板。
讓我們把這棵樹鋸一鋸。
讓我們把這棵樹鋸一鋸。

sentences.english: I try out sawing up a big ice cube.
sentences.chinese: 我就來試試鋸冰塊，鋸得太差，造不成冰屋。

sentences.english: Researchers call it the glacial buzz-saw.
sentences.chinese: 研究人員稱之爲爲“冰山鋸”。

sentences.english: They translate the lifting power of the serratus muscles into elevation of the midabdomen and frontal pelvis.
sentences.chinese: 它將前鋸肌的提升力傳導到中腹部和骨盆前側。

sentences.english: Objective To explore serratus anterior muscle transplantation for the repair of soft tissue defects in foot and ankle.
sentences.chinese: 目的應用前鋸肌瓣修復足踝部軟組織缺損。

sentences.english: The utility model relates to a universal compass saw which belongs to an electric tool.
sentences.chinese: 一種萬能曲線鋸，屬於電動工具。

definition: hammer/to hammer into shape/weight (e.g. of a steelyard or balance)/to strike with a hammer
to tie/bind or fasten together/to kidnap
nail/to follow closely/to keep at sb (to do sth)/variant of 盯[ding1]
to join things together by fixing them in place at one or more points/to nail/to pin/to staple/to sew on
to die/to shoot dead/to reject/to fall forward/(suffix) to death
